name: Glasses Simulator 2020
description:
Ever wanted to be a pair of glasses, but being on a face all day just sounded rotten?

Ever thought even the simplest of games was too complicated?

Ever wanted a game that wasn't fun in the slightest?

Then Glasses Simulator 2020 might be for you!

It is an awful pun in video game form.

It's free because paying 2 cents for it might be overcharging.
